service.name: /psal432.ps
service.query: SELECT FILENAME FROM DPS.PS_FLOORPLAN WHERE STR_CD = ? AND FLOOR_CD = ?

SELECT FPS.STR_CD||FPS.FLOOR_CD AS BLOCK_ID , FPS.PUMBUN_CD , DPS.FN_GET_PUMBUN_NAME(FPS.PUMBUN_CD) AS PUMBUN_NAME , SPN.SALE_ORG_CD AS ORG_CD , DPS.FN_GET_ORG_SHORT_NAME(SUBSTR(SPN.SALE_ORG_CD,0,2) ,SUBSTR(SPN.SALE_ORG_CD,3,2) ,SUBSTR(SPN.SALE_ORG_CD,5,2) ,'00' ,'00') AS TEAM_NAME , FPS.VIRE_YN , FPS.RETAIL_VIEW_YN , FPS.SPOT_X , FPS.SPOT_Y , ? AS SALE_DT , NVL(PBNAMT.GOAL_SALE_AMT,0) AS GOAL_SALE_AMT , NVL(PBNAMT.SALE_AMT,0) AS SALE_AMT , NVL(PBNAMT.CUST_CNT,0) AS CUST_CNT FROM DPS.PS_FLOORPOSITION FPS , DPS.PC_STRPBN SPN , ( SELECT PUMBUN_CD , SUM(GOAL_SALE_AMT) AS GOAL_SALE_AMT , SUM(SALE_AMT) AS SALE_AMT , SUM(CUST_CNT) AS CUST_CNT FROM (SELECT PUMBUN_CD , NULL AS GOAL_SALE_AMT , TOT_SALE_AMT AS SALE_AMT , CUST_CNT AS CUST_CNT FROM DPS.PS_DAYPBN WHERE STR_CD = ? AND SALE_DT = ? UNION ALL SELECT PUMBUN_CD , ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT AS GOAL_SALE_AMT , NULL AS SALE_AMT , NULL AS CUST_CNT FROM DPS.PS_ACTPUMBUN WHERE STR_CD = ? AND EXE_DT = ? ) GROUP BY PUMBUN_CD ) PBNAMT WHERE FPS.STR_CD = SPN.STR_CD AND FPS.PUMBUN_CD = SPN.PUMBUN_CD AND FPS.PUMBUN_CD = PBNAMT.PUMBUN_CD(+) AND FPS.STR_CD = ? AND FPS.FLOOR_CD = ? ORDER BY FPS.SPOT_X, FPS.SPOT_Y

SELECT VEN_INFO.COMP_NAME , VEN_INFO.REP_NAME , VEN_INFO.APP_S_DT , VEN_INFO.BIZ_STAT , VEN_INFO.BIZ_CAT , NVL(DAY_INFO.GOAL_SALE_AMT , 0) AS DAY_GOAL_SALE_AMT , NVL(DAY_INFO.SALE_AMT , 0) AS DAY_SALE_AMT , NVL(DAY_INFO.GOAL_SALE_RATE , 0) AS DAY_GOAL_SALE_RATE , NVL(DAY_INFO.BFYY_SALE_AMT , 0) AS DAY_BFYY_SALE_AMT , NVL(DAY_INFO.CUST_CNT , 0) AS DAY_CUST_CNT , NVL(DAY_INFO.CUST_AMT , 0) AS DAY_CUST_AMT , NVL(MONTH_INFO.GOAL_SALE_AMT , 0) AS MONTH_GOAL_SALE_AMT , NVL(MONTH_INFO.SALE_AMT , 0) AS MONTH_SALE_AMT , NVL(MONTH_INFO.GOAL_SALE_RATE , 0) AS MONTH_GOAL_SALE_RATE , NVL(MONTH_INFO.DAY_AMT , 0) AS MONTH_DAY_AMT , NVL(MONTH_INFO.BFYY_SALE_AMT , 0) AS MONTH_BFYY_SALE_AMT , NVL(MONTH_INFO.BF_AF_RATE , 0) AS MONTH_BF_AF_RATE , NVL(MONTH_INFO.GOAL_MONTH_AMT , 0) AS MONTH_GOAL_MONTH_AMT , NVL(MONTH_INFO.GOAL_MONTH_RATE, 0) AS MONTH_GOAL_MONTH_RATE , NVL(YEAR_INFO.GOAL_SALE_AMT , 0) AS YEAR_GOAL_SALE_AMT , NVL(YEAR_INFO.SALE_AMT , 0) AS YEAR_SALE_AMT , NVL(YEAR_INFO.GOAL_SALE_RATE , 0) AS YEAR_GOAL_SALE_RATE , NVL(YEAR_INFO.DAY_AMT , 0) AS YEAR_DAY_AMT , NVL(YEAR_INFO.BFYY_SALE_AMT , 0) AS YEAR_BFYY_SALE_AMT , NVL(YEAR_INFO.BF_AF_RATE , 0) AS YEAR_BF_AF_RATE , NVL(YEAR_INFO.GOAL_YEAR_AMT , 0) AS YEAR_GOAL_YEAR_AMT , NVL(YEAR_INFO.GOAL_YEAR_RATE , 0) AS YEAR_GOAL_YEAR_RATE FROM (SELECT SPN.PUMBUN_CD , VEN.COMP_NAME , VEN.REP_NAME , SPN.APP_S_DT , VEN.BIZ_STAT , VEN.BIZ_CAT FROM DPS.PC_STRPBN SPN , DPS.PC_VENMST VEN , DPS.PC_STRVENMST SVM WHERE SPN.STR_CD = SVM.STR_CD AND SPN.VEN_CD = SVM.VEN_CD AND SPN.VEN_CD = VEN.VEN_CD AND SPN.STR_CD = ? AND SPN.PUMBUN_CD = ? ) VEN_INFO , (SELECT PUMBUN_CD , NVL(SUM(GOAL_SALE_AMT),0) AS GOAL_SALE_AMT , NVL(SUM(SALE_AMT),0) AS SALE_AMT , CASE WHEN NVL(SUM(GOAL_SALE_AMT),0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((NVL(SUM(SALE_AMT),0)/SUM(GOAL_SALE_AMT))*100,2) END AS GOAL_SALE_RATE , NVL(SUM(BFYY_SALE_AMT),0) AS BFYY_SALE_AMT , NVL(SUM(CUST_CNT),0) AS CUST_CNT , NVL(SUM(CUST_AMT),0) AS CUST_AMT FROM (SELECT PUMBUN_CD , NULL AS GOAL_SALE_AMT , TOT_SALE_AMT AS SALE_AMT , CUST_CNT AS CUST_CNT , CASE WHEN NVL(CUST_CNT,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(TOT_SALE_AMT/CUST_CNT) END AS CUST_AMT , NULL AS BFYY_SALE_AMT FROM DPS.PS_DAYPBN WHERE STR_CD = ? AND PUMBUN_CD = ? AND SALE_DT = ? UNION ALL SELECT PUMBUN_CD , NULL AS GOAL_SALE_AMT , NULL AS SALE_AMT , NULL AS CUST_CNT , NULL AS CUST_AMT , TOT_SALE_AMT AS BFYY_SALE_AMT FROM DPS.PS_DAYPBN WHERE STR_CD = ? AND PUMBUN_CD = ? AND SALE_DT = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(?,'YYYYMMDD'), -12),'YYYYMMDD') UNION ALL SELECT PUMBUN_CD , ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT AS GOAL_SALE_AMT , NULL AS SALE_AMT , NULL AS CUST_CNT , NULL AS CUST_AMT , NULL AS BFYY_SALE_AMT FROM DPS.PS_ACTPUMBUN WHERE STR_CD = ? AND PUMBUN_CD = ? AND EXE_DT = ? ) GROUP BY PUMBUN_CD ) DAY_INFO ,(SELECT PUMBUN_CD , NVL(SUM(GOAL_SALE_AMT),0) AS GOAL_SALE_AMT , NVL(SUM(SALE_AMT),0) AS SALE_AMT , CASE WHEN NVL(SUM(GOAL_SALE_AMT),0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((NVL(SUM(SALE_AMT),0)/SUM(GOAL_SALE_AMT))*100,2) END AS GOAL_SALE_RATE , NVL(SUM(DAY_AMT),0) AS DAY_AMT , NVL(SUM(BFYY_SALE_AMT),0) AS BFYY_SALE_AMT , CASE WHEN NVL(SUM(BFYY_SALE_AMT),0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((NVL(SUM(SALE_AMT),0)/SUM(BFYY_SALE_AMT))*100,2) END AS BF_AF_RATE , NVL(SUM(GOAL_MONTH_AMT),0) AS GOAL_MONTH_AMT , CASE WHEN NVL(SUM(GOAL_MONTH_AMT),0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((NVL(SUM(SALE_AMT),0)/SUM(GOAL_MONTH_AMT))*100,2) END AS GOAL_MONTH_RATE FROM (SELECT PUMBUN_CD , NULL AS GOAL_SALE_AMT , TOT_SALE_AMT AS SALE_AMT , ROUND(TOT_SALE_AMT /(TO_DATE(?,'YYYYMMDD') - LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(?,'YYYYMMDD'), -1))) ) AS DAY_AMT , NULL AS BFYY_SALE_AMT , NULL AS GOAL_MONTH_AMT FROM DPS.PS_MONTHPBN WHERE STR_CD = ? AND PUMBUN_CD = ? AND SALE_YM = SUBSTR(?,0,6) UNION ALL SELECT PUMBUN_CD , NULL AS GOAL_SALE_AMT , NULL AS SALE_AMT , NULL AS DAY_AMT , TOT_SALE_AMT AS BFYY_SALE_AMT , NULL AS GOAL_MONTH_AMT FROM DPS.PS_MONTHPBN WHERE STR_CD = ? AND PUMBUN_CD = ? AND SALE_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(?,'YYYYMMDD'), -12),'YYYYMM') UNION ALL SELECT PUMBUN_CD , ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT AS GOAL_SALE_AMT , NULL AS SALE_AMT , NULL AS DAY_AMT , NULL AS BFYY_SALE_AMT , NULL AS GOAL_MONTH_AMT FROM DPS.PS_ACTPUMBUN WHERE STR_CD = ? AND PUMBUN_CD = ? AND EXE_DT BETWEEN SUBSTR(?,0,6)||'01' AND ? UNION ALL SELECT PUMBUN_CD , NULL AS GOAL_SALE_AMT , NULL AS SALE_AMT , NULL AS DAY_AMT , NULL AS BFYY_SALE_AMT , ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT AS GOAL_MONTH_AMT FROM DPS.PS_ACTPUMBUN WHERE STR_CD = ? AND PUMBUN_CD = ? AND EXE_DT BETWEEN SUBSTR(?,0,6)||'01' AND TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(?,'YYYYMMDD')),'YYYYMMDD') ) GROUP BY PUMBUN_CD ) MONTH_INFO ,(SELECT PUMBUN_CD , NVL(SUM(GOAL_SALE_AMT),0) AS GOAL_SALE_AMT , NVL(SUM(SALE_AMT),0) AS SALE_AMT , CASE WHEN NVL(SUM(GOAL_SALE_AMT),0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((NVL(SUM(SALE_AMT),0)/SUM(GOAL_SALE_AMT))*100,2) END AS GOAL_SALE_RATE , ROUND(NVL(SUM(SALE_AMT),0) /(TO_DATE(?,'YYYYMMDD') - LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(?,'YYYYMMDD'), -12))) ) AS DAY_AMT , NVL(SUM(BFYY_SALE_AMT),0) AS BFYY_SALE_AMT , CASE WHEN NVL(SUM(BFYY_SALE_AMT),0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((NVL(SUM(SALE_AMT),0)/SUM(BFYY_SALE_AMT))*100,2) END AS BF_AF_RATE , NVL(SUM(GOAL_YEAR_AMT),0) AS GOAL_YEAR_AMT , CASE WHEN NVL(SUM(GOAL_YEAR_AMT),0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((NVL(SUM(SALE_AMT),0)/SUM(GOAL_YEAR_AMT))*100,2) END AS GOAL_YEAR_RATE FROM (SELECT PUMBUN_CD , NULL AS GOAL_SALE_AMT , TOT_SALE_AMT AS SALE_AMT , NULL AS BFYY_SALE_AMT , NULL AS GOAL_YEAR_AMT FROM DPS.PS_MONTHPBN WHERE STR_CD = ? AND PUMBUN_CD = ? AND SALE_YM BETWEEN SUBSTR(?,0,4)||'01' AND SUBSTR(?,0,6) UNION ALL SELECT PUMBUN_CD , NULL AS GOAL_SALE_AMT , NULL AS SALE_AMT , TOT_SALE_AMT AS BFYY_SALE_AMT , NULL AS GOAL_YEAR_AMT FROM DPS.PS_MONTHPBN WHERE STR_CD = ? AND PUMBUN_CD = ? AND SALE_YM BETWEEN (SUBSTR(?,0,4)-1)||'01' AND TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(?,'YYYYMMDD'), -12),'YYYYMM') UNION ALL SELECT PUMBUN_CD , ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT AS GOAL_SALE_AMT , NULL AS SALE_AMT , NULL AS BFYY_SALE_AMT , NULL AS GOAL_YEAR_AMT FROM DPS.PS_ACTPUMBUN WHERE STR_CD = ? AND PUMBUN_CD = ? AND EXE_DT BETWEEN SUBSTR(?,0,4)||'0101' AND ? UNION ALL SELECT PUMBUN_CD , NULL AS GOAL_SALE_AMT , NULL AS SALE_AMT , NULL AS BFYY_SALE_AMT , ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT AS GOAL_YEAR_AMT FROM DPS.PS_ACTPUMBUN WHERE STR_CD = ? AND PUMBUN_CD = ? AND EXE_DT BETWEEN SUBSTR(?,0,4)||'0101' AND SUBSTR(?,0,4)||'1231' ) GROUP BY PUMBUN_CD ) YEAR_INFO WHERE VEN_INFO.PUMBUN_CD = DAY_INFO.PUMBUN_CD(+) AND VEN_INFO.PUMBUN_CD = MONTH_INFO.PUMBUN_CD(+) AND VEN_INFO.PUMBUN_CD = YEAR_INFO.PUMBUN_CD(+)

SELECT SALE_DT , SUM(CUST_CNT) AS CUST_CNT , SUM(TOT_SALE_AMT) AS TOT_SALE_AMT , CASE WHEN SUM(CUST_CNT) = 0 THEN SUM(TOT_SALE_AMT) ELSE ROUND(SUM(TOT_SALE_AMT)/SUM(CUST_CNT)) END AS CUST_SALE_AMT , SUM(DC_AMT) AS DC_AMT , SUM(SALE_PROF_AMT) AS SALE_PROF_AMT , CASE WHEN SUM(TOT_SALE_AMT) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((SUM(SALE_PROF_AMT)/SUM(TOT_SALE_AMT))*100,2) END AS SALE_PROF_RATE FROM DPS.PS_DAYPBN WHERE STR_CD = ? AND PUMBUN_CD = ? AND SALE_DT BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY SALE_DT ORDER BY SALE_DT

SELECT SALE_YM , SUM(CUST_CNT) AS CUST_CNT , SUM(TOT_SALE_AMT) AS TOT_SALE_AMT , CASE WHEN SUM(CUST_CNT) = 0 THEN SUM(TOT_SALE_AMT) ELSE ROUND(SUM(TOT_SALE_AMT)/SUM(CUST_CNT)) END AS CUST_SALE_AMT , SUM(DC_AMT) AS DC_AMT , SUM(SALE_PROF_AMT) AS SALE_PROF_AMT , CASE WHEN SUM(TOT_SALE_AMT) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((SUM(SALE_PROF_AMT)/SUM(TOT_SALE_AMT))*100,2) END AS SALE_PROF_RATE FROM DPS.PS_MONTHPBN WHERE STR_CD = ? AND PUMBUN_CD = ? AND SALE_YM BETWEEN SUBSTR(?,0,6) AND SUBSTR(?,0,6) GROUP BY SALE_YM ORDER BY SALE_YM

SELECT SALE_DT , SUM(TIME_09) AS TIME_09 , SUM(TIME_10) AS TIME_10 , SUM(TIME_11) AS TIME_11 , SUM(TIME_12) AS TIME_12 , SUM(TIME_13) AS TIME_13 , SUM(TIME_14) AS TIME_14 , SUM(TIME_15) AS TIME_15 , SUM(TIME_16) AS TIME_16 , SUM(TIME_17) AS TIME_17 , SUM(TIME_18) AS TIME_18 , SUM(TIME_19) AS TIME_19 , SUM(TIME_20) AS TIME_20 , SUM(TIME_21) AS TIME_21 , SUM(TIME_22) AS TIME_22 , SUM(TIME_23) AS TIME_23 , SUM(TOT_SALE_AMT) AS TOTAL FROM (SELECT SALE_DT , CASE WHEN SALE_TIME < '1000' THEN TOT_SALE_AMT END AS TIME_09 , CASE WHEN SALE_TIME >= '1000' AND SALE_TIME < '1100' THEN TOT_SALE_AMT END AS TIME_10 , CASE WHEN SALE_TIME >= '1100' AND SALE_TIME < '1200' THEN TOT_SALE_AMT END AS TIME_11 , CASE WHEN SALE_TIME >= '1200' AND SALE_TIME < '1300' THEN TOT_SALE_AMT END AS TIME_12 , CASE WHEN SALE_TIME >= '1300' AND SALE_TIME < '1400' THEN TOT_SALE_AMT END AS TIME_13 , CASE WHEN SALE_TIME >= '1400' AND SALE_TIME < '1500' THEN TOT_SALE_AMT END AS TIME_14 , CASE WHEN SALE_TIME >= '1500' AND SALE_TIME < '1600' THEN TOT_SALE_AMT END AS TIME_15 , CASE WHEN SALE_TIME >= '1600' AND SALE_TIME < '1700' THEN TOT_SALE_AMT END AS TIME_16 , CASE WHEN SALE_TIME >= '1700' AND SALE_TIME < '1800' THEN TOT_SALE_AMT END AS TIME_17 , CASE WHEN SALE_TIME >= '1800' AND SALE_TIME < '1900' THEN TOT_SALE_AMT END AS TIME_18 , CASE WHEN SALE_TIME >= '1900' AND SALE_TIME < '2000' THEN TOT_SALE_AMT END AS TIME_19 , CASE WHEN SALE_TIME >= '2000' AND SALE_TIME < '2100' THEN TOT_SALE_AMT END AS TIME_20 , CASE WHEN SALE_TIME >= '2100' AND SALE_TIME < '2200' THEN TOT_SALE_AMT END AS TIME_21 , CASE WHEN SALE_TIME >= '2200' AND SALE_TIME < '2300' THEN TOT_SALE_AMT END AS TIME_22 , CASE WHEN SALE_TIME >= '2300' THEN TOT_SALE_AMT END AS TIME_23 , TOT_SALE_AMT FROM DPS.PS_TIMEPBN WHERE STR_CD = ? AND PUMBUN_CD = ? AND SALE_DT BETWEEN ? AND ? ) GROUP BY SALE_DT ORDER BY SALE_DT

SELECT SUM(GRADE_01_AMT) AS GRADE_01_AMT , SUM(GRADE_01_CNT) AS GRADE_01_CNT , SUM(GRADE_02_AMT) AS GRADE_02_AMT , SUM(GRADE_02_CNT) AS GRADE_02_CNT , SUM(GRADE_03_AMT) AS GRADE_03_AMT , SUM(GRADE_03_CNT) AS GRADE_03_CNT , SUM(GRADE_04_AMT) AS GRADE_04_AMT , SUM(GRADE_04_CNT) AS GRADE_04_CNT , SUM(REAL_SALE_AMT) AS GRADE_TOTAL_AMT , SUM(CNT) AS GRADE_TOTAL_CNT FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN CUST_GRADE = '41' THEN NVL(SALE_AMT,0) - NVL(RETURN_AMT,0) END AS GRADE_01_AMT , CASE WHEN CUST_GRADE = '41' THEN 1 END AS GRADE_01_CNT , CASE WHEN CUST_GRADE = '31' THEN NVL(SALE_AMT,0) - NVL(RETURN_AMT,0) END AS GRADE_02_AMT , CASE WHEN CUST_GRADE = '31' THEN 1 END AS GRADE_02_CNT , CASE WHEN CUST_GRADE = '21' THEN NVL(SALE_AMT,0) - NVL(RETURN_AMT,0) END AS GRADE_03_AMT , CASE WHEN CUST_GRADE = '21' THEN 1 END AS GRADE_03_CNT , CASE WHEN CUST_GRADE = '11' THEN NVL(SALE_AMT,0) - NVL(RETURN_AMT,0) END AS GRADE_04_AMT , CASE WHEN CUST_GRADE = '11' THEN 1 END AS GRADE_04_CNT , NVL(SALE_AMT,0) - NVL(RETURN_AMT,0) AS REAL_SALE_AMT , 1 AS CNT FROM DPS.PS_DAYCUST WHERE STR_CD = ? AND PUMBUN_CD = ? AND SALE_DT BETWEEN ? AND ? AND CUST_GRADE IN ('41','31','21','11') )

SELECT SUM(SEX_F_AMT) AS SEX_F_AMT , SUM(SEX_F_CNT) AS SEX_F_CNT , SUM(SEX_M_AMT) AS SEX_M_AMT , SUM(SEX_M_CNT) AS SEX_M_CNT , SUM(REAL_SALE_AMT) AS SEX_TOTAL_AMT , SUM(CNT) AS SEX_TOTAL_CNT FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN CUST_SEX = 'F' THEN NVL(SALE_AMT,0) - NVL(RETURN_AMT,0) END AS SEX_F_AMT , CASE WHEN CUST_SEX = 'F' THEN 1 END AS SEX_F_CNT , CASE WHEN CUST_SEX = 'M' THEN NVL(SALE_AMT,0) - NVL(RETURN_AMT,0) END AS SEX_M_AMT , CASE WHEN CUST_SEX = 'M' THEN 1 END AS SEX_M_CNT , NVL(SALE_AMT,0) - NVL(RETURN_AMT,0) AS REAL_SALE_AMT , 1 AS CNT FROM DPS.PS_DAYCUST WHERE STR_CD = ? AND PUMBUN_CD = ? AND SALE_DT BETWEEN ? AND ? AND CUST_SEX IN ('M','F') )

SELECT SUM(AGE_19_AMT) AS AGE_19_AMT , SUM(AGE_19_CNT) AS AGE_19_CNT , SUM(AGE_20_AMT) AS AGE_20_AMT , SUM(AGE_20_CNT) AS AGE_20_CNT , SUM(AGE_30_AMT) AS AGE_30_AMT , SUM(AGE_30_CNT) AS AGE_30_CNT , SUM(AGE_40_AMT) AS AGE_40_AMT , SUM(AGE_40_CNT) AS AGE_40_CNT , SUM(AGE_50_AMT) AS AGE_50_AMT , SUM(AGE_50_CNT) AS AGE_50_CNT , SUM(AGE_60_AMT) AS AGE_60_AMT , SUM(AGE_60_CNT) AS AGE_60_CNT , SUM(AGE_70_AMT) AS AGE_70_AMT , SUM(AGE_70_CNT) AS AGE_70_CNT , SUM(REAL_SALE_AMT) AS AGE_TOTAL_AMT , SUM(CNT) AS AGE_TOTAL_CNT FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN CUST_AGE < 20 THEN NVL(SALE_AMT,0) - NVL(RETURN_AMT,0) END AS AGE_19_AMT , CASE WHEN CUST_AGE < 20 THEN 1 END AS AGE_19_CNT , CASE WHEN CUST_AGE >= 20 AND CUST_AGE < 30 THEN NVL(SALE_AMT,0) - NVL(RETURN_AMT,0) END AS AGE_20_AMT , CASE WHEN CUST_AGE >= 20 AND CUST_AGE < 30 THEN 1 END AS AGE_20_CNT , CASE WHEN CUST_AGE >= 30 AND CUST_AGE < 40 THEN NVL(SALE_AMT,0) - NVL(RETURN_AMT,0) END AS AGE_30_AMT , CASE WHEN CUST_AGE >= 30 AND CUST_AGE < 40 THEN 1 END AS AGE_30_CNT , CASE WHEN CUST_AGE >= 40 AND CUST_AGE < 50 THEN NVL(SALE_AMT,0) - NVL(RETURN_AMT,0) END AS AGE_40_AMT , CASE WHEN CUST_AGE >= 40 AND CUST_AGE < 50 THEN 1 END AS AGE_40_CNT , CASE WHEN CUST_AGE >= 50 AND CUST_AGE < 60 THEN NVL(SALE_AMT,0) - NVL(RETURN_AMT,0) END AS AGE_50_AMT , CASE WHEN CUST_AGE >= 50 AND CUST_AGE < 60 THEN 1 END AS AGE_50_CNT , CASE WHEN CUST_AGE >= 60 AND CUST_AGE < 70 THEN NVL(SALE_AMT,0) - NVL(RETURN_AMT,0) END AS AGE_60_AMT , CASE WHEN CUST_AGE >= 60 AND CUST_AGE < 70 THEN 1 END AS AGE_60_CNT , CASE WHEN CUST_AGE >= 70 THEN NVL(SALE_AMT,0) - NVL(RETURN_AMT,0) END AS AGE_70_AMT , CASE WHEN CUST_AGE >= 70 THEN 1 END AS AGE_70_CNT , NVL(SALE_AMT,0) - NVL(RETURN_AMT,0) AS REAL_SALE_AMT , 1 AS CNT FROM DPS.PS_DAYCUST WHERE STR_CD = ? AND PUMBUN_CD = ? AND CUST_AGE IS NOT NULL AND SALE_DT BETWEEN ? AND ? )
